column4: any of you know how i can get a new tab in firefox whenver i click on a link in gaim?
you can change an option in the preference
use tabs instead of new windows
I just finished to install draper but my wifi card is not finding any access points
with breezy that was no prob at all
in firefox preferences? I've already done that. The problem is that gaim complains that a firefox window is already open, and that it can't open up a new one
Firefox is already running, but is not responding. To open a new window, you must first close the existing Firefox process, or restart your system.
there is a tab called tabs
I have spanish so it is called pestaas
I have set e options open in most recent windows a new tab
don't worry, i understood. I already have that option "a new tab in the most recent window" checked
